meanings.definition: The act of forming or producing pustules.
meanings.sent1: After the insect bite, the pustulation on his arm was red and swollen.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with chickenpox due to the pustulation on her skin.
meanings.sent3: The pustulation on the pizza made it look like it had extra cheese, but it was actually a fungal growth.
meanings.sent4: The pustulation of lies in the gossip spread through the small town.
meanings.sent5: The pustulation on the tree bark indicated a disease affecting the plant.

meanings.definition: The state of being covered in pustules.
meanings.sent1: The contagious disease led to the pustulation of the entire village.
meanings.sent2: The pustulation on her face made her self-conscious about her appearance.
meanings.sent3: Despite the pustulation on the cat's fur, it still purred contently in the sun.
meanings.sent4: The pustulation of bubbles on the surface of the soup indicated it was boiling hot.
meanings.sent5: The pustulation of acne on his back was a source of embarrassment during gym class.
